pagination.rowsPerPage: Ntrɛwmu dodow a ɛwɔ kratafa biara mu .

kick.title: Si so dua sɛ obi a ɔrebɔ ne nan no yɛ .
kick.content: Wopɛ sɛ wopam ɔmannifo no fi dan no mu?

ban.title: Si so dua sɛ asɔremma a wɔabara wɔn no .
ban.content: Wogye di sɛ wopɛ sɛ wobara saa ɔmannifo yi? Ɔmannifo no rentumi nsan nkɔka dan no ho wɔ bara a wɔabara no akyi.

kick.success: Wɔapam asɔremma no afi dan no mu .
kick.error: a wɔpam asɔremma no dii nkogu .

invite.title: To nsa frɛ asɔremma ma wɔmmɛka dan no ho .
invite.inputLabel: Yɛsrɛ wo kyerɛw Matrix dwumadie ID (te sɛ @user:matrix.org) .
invite.error: Nsato krataa no antumi anyɛ yiye, yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ user ID anaa tumi krataa .
